nodes.text: Sword Squadron was a walker-equipped squadron that was part of the Order of Revan forces during 3637 BBY. Sword Squadron Walkers 1 and 2 were trying to stop a Coalition strike team from reaching the Temple of Sacrifice, but were unsuccessful and were destroyed.
Sword Squadron Walkers 1 and 2 appear in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
